page.title: 04People and home life
page.content: The people of Littlebeck and Sneatonthorpe and the farms on the moors are mainly farmers and agricultural workers. Most people keep many domestic pets in their homes, mainly sheep, dogs and cats, which also give service on the farms. The people also have chickens, pigs, sheep, goats, ducks and cows which provide them with food for the family such as milk, eggs, bacon, cheese and wool. Many wives, being able to use a spinning wheel, use the fleeces from the sheep which they dye and spin to make coollens for the family. Most people own their own transport which provides essential travel to the next town or village.
